original_title: Mayor Wu big mouth bought her some ICE...Acting ICE Director Todd Lyons said federal immigration authorities plan to “flood” Boston in response to Mayor Michelle Wu’s refusal to dismantle the city’s sanctuary protections, as ordered by the Trump administration.  — The Donald
article_summary: Acting ICE Director threatens to "flood" Boston in response to Mayor Michelle Wu's refusal to dismantle sanctuary protections, as ordered by the Trump administration. Online commentators express concern and criticism, suggesting potential illegal actions and political motives.</s>
